features: Healthy & Durable: The wooden stove top cover board is expertly crafted from premium quality natural bamboo wood. Hard texture, long-lasting and durable.
Large Work Surface: Our noodle board stove cover is 30 "L x 22 "W x 0.8 "T, fits perfectly over most electric stovetops, gas ranges and sinks.
Multiple Uses: Wood stove top cover board, noodle board, wooden food serving board, extra large cutting baord, over the sink cutting board.

Creates Extra Counter Space : Place the wood stove top cover directly over the stove and sink. Get more kitchen workspace to put cooking utensils. Perfect for small apartment, RV and kitchen without enough counters.

The long lasting bamboo stove cover cutting board. Use as the ultimate carving board for BBQs or flip it over and use it for extra countertop space over your stove or sink. Even use it as a giant charcuterie board to wow your guests!

productInformation.value: Reversible, Long Lasting, Eco-Friendly, Build-in Groove

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our noodle board stove cover size is 30"L x 20"W, it can provide extra large work space in your kitchen, you can use is as gas stove top, electric stove top and sink cover to increase counter top work space, and also can be used as extra large cutting board, large serving tray and charcuterie board.

ELEGANT AND PRACTICAL Our wood stove top cover is made of premium Bamboo, unique colors and natural textures can add extra elegance and beauty to your kitchen and life. The Bamboo has always been the first choice for making high-end cutting boards. ( Please do not wash with a dish-washer to have a longer life)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I normally do not write reviews but had to for this bamboo board. It is exactly the size I was looking for. It covers my gas stove perfectly and also the sink for when I need more counter space. It is beautifully made and very sturdy.Plus the cost was right in my budget compared to "noodle" boards that I had already purchased and returned as they did not fit right. I may have to purchase another one of these so I have 2 for that extra counter space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, and cleans well fits on our stovetop perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cover for my stove top
reviews.reviewText: It looks very nice sitting on my stove top. Creates additional counter space and also use as a cutting board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit pricey
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping it would've been a little darker. The fit is okay, just a pinch shy of the end of stove width, more like stops right when the burners stopped, (no overhang) but that might make it more steady this way. The demension is probably an a half inch off, measurement is at the middle of board which is longer than the ends. It does not reach to the back of the stove. Think of it as a burner cover. I like how there is no grooves but has a nice smooth top so no crumbs or anything can hide in. I have a smaller cutting board that matches this and it holds up great. All in all it does the trick and covers the whole gas stove top. My fault about the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wood oven topper
reviews.reviewText: great size -covers my whole stove top. Came with a slight clear coat which was great.I had always used 2 cutting boards on top of my stove to protect the surface from daily wear and tear. This one piece looks nice- only issue is it is a little heavier to move off and larger to be able to find a spot to put it.It does fit over my sink opening too if I would ever need additional "counter" space in a pinch.I would recommend this board

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly over the stove. Creates more counter space, protects my flat top stove, and is convient to use as a cutting board when food prepping. Can also fit over my sink which was a nice surprise! Good quality. Think and hefty without being too heavy. Easy to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This came on time and exceeds my expectations. It’s super smooth and elegant looking, as well as being very useful as a cutting board. I dont really want to use it as a cutting board though, as it’s too pretty to scratch up, lol. It’s very heavy duty too, not cheap or lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Covers my stove great! More counterspace!
reviews.reviewText: I have a small kitchen and limited counterspace. I put this up on my stove when I need extra prep room, works great!
